s2.message:
The user interface of Adblock Plus is intentionally not very customizable, the idea is to
  have it work well out of the box without requiring users to tweak things.

s3.message:
As a
  result, some compromises have to be made and sometimes the user interface is suboptimal for
  power users.

s4.message:
Customizations extension is a collection of semi-supported user
  interface tweaks for people who feel the need to change something.

s8.message: Customizations can be installed and updated without restarting the browser.

s9.message:
After
  installing you can go to the Add-ons Manager and press the Options button for this
  extension.

s10.message:
You will see the add-on description followed by a list of available
  options.

s12.message: Various Filter Preferences tweaks to create a minimalistic layout

s13.message: Toolbar icon display (text only, image only, both)

s14.message: Remove Adblock Plus from all browser menus

s15.message: Tweaking some hidden Adblock Plus preferences
